title: New: Bedroom – Nostalgic Feel
body: As [I.am.no.superman.](http://iamnosuperman.com/musik-neuer-song/bedroom-nostalgic-feel/) so accurately points out, Bedroom’s music is anchored amongst hazy memories and amongst the process of maintaining, embellishing and moulding past emotions into sound. The solo project of sixteen year old **Noah Kittinger** from Nashville, his music draws from 60’s inspirations, with smatterings of the **Beach Boys** draped throughout his previous tracks, and most prominently on new cut _Nostalgic Feel_. It’s the sound of being young, careless, emotionally fraught and charmingly innocent. Check it out below.
